titleStmt.title: Reprobation asserted, or, The doctrine of eternal election & reprobation promiscuously handled in eleven chapters wherein the most material objections made by the opposers of this doctrine are fully answered, several doubts removed, and sundry cases of conscience resolved / by John Bunyan.
titleStmt.author: Bunyan, John, 1628-1688.

notesStmt.note: Date of publication suggested by Wing.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
